{{Event Tabs}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Start the event)
:Every twinkling star is a record of an encounter on our journey.
:Hey Travelers, come and pass Paimon's test, and remember our friends from the journey, together!
:;(Take the Test)

;(During the first attempt)
:'''Paimon:''' Come and listen to a snippet from the original song~
:'''Paimon:''' Then, choose the character that matches the music!
:'''Paimon:''' Finally, click to submit your guess~

;(After submitting a wrong choice on the first attempt the first time)
:'''Paimon:''' Let's take a look at the dialogue~

;(After submitting a wrong choice on the first attempt, one of the following will be shown)
:'''Paimon:''' Hmmm... that's not right. Let's try again.
:'''Paimon:''' It doesn't seem to be this person... Let the melody evoke the picture in your mind.
:'''Paimon:''' Maybe Paimon's not humming it right? Play the next musical hint and listen carefully.

;(After submitting a wrong choice on the second attempt the first time)
:'''Paimon:''' The final clue is a quote from this character.

;(After submitting a wrong choice on the second attempt, one of the following will be shown)
:'''Paimon:''' Almost there. Paimon will give you another chance to answer!
:'''Paimon:''' Eh... that's not the right answer. Try again!

;(After submitting a wrong choice on the third attempt)
:'''Paimon:''' You look like you're having a hard time answering. Let Paimon give you the answer!

;(After submitting a correct choice, one of the following will be shown)
:'''Paimon:''' Incredible! You know your companions' melodies well!
:'''Paimon:''' You did great! Paimon wasn't half bad at humming, too!
:'''Paimon:''' Correct! You have amazing music sense~
:'''Paimon:''' Correct! You answered that effortlessly.
:'''Paimon:''' It's impressive that you got this right!
{{Dialogue End}}
